mapper.select: SELECT id, customer_id, order_no, order_status, order_from, ec_code, ec_order_no, sotre_id, wh_id, cr_time, up_time, inner_org_id FROM out_order where id = #{id}
SELECT id, customer_id, order_no, order_status, order_from, ec_code, ec_order_no, sotre_id, wh_id, cr_time, up_time, inner_org_id FROM out_order where 1 = 1
